nodes.text: Inaldra was a female Twi'lek who was the head of Tansarii Point Station, a space station in orbit above Ord Mantell during the Galactic Civil War. She had to deal with the Black Sun, who had practically overrun the station, and many other problems on board the station.

Inaldra appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
